New Records: Taskin Ahmed recorded career-best figures of 4/25
Bangladesh secured their first win in the second round of a T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed dismissed the first two Dutch batters with twin blows
Paol van Meekeren led a Netherlands comeback with 2/21
Shakib Al Hasan removed Scott Edwards with a delivery down the leg side
Bangladesh lost five wickets for 33 runs in the Power Play
Bangladesh's innings were held together by Atif Hossan's 27-ball 38
Shariz Ahmed made his T20 World Cup debut with 3/0/27/1
Bangladesh were sent in and got off to a solid start with a 43-run opening partnership
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh next face South Africa in Sydney on Thursday
The Netherlands will take on India
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dutch skipper Scott Edwards played two young spinners
Rain came to Bangladesh's rescue briefly
Bangladesh's opening partnership of 43 runs was crucial
Others: Max O'Dowd and Tom Cooper were dismissed via run outs
Vikramjit Singh and Bas de Leede were dismissed early
